question: Which of the following best define the term Relationship discount?
option1: It is given to the couple applying for personal loans.
option2: It is an additional benefit by banks.
option3: It is given to a prospective applicant if they have a pre-existing relationship with the lender.
explanation: Relationship discount is an additional benefit that is provided by the banks or lenders to a prospective applicant if they have a pre-existing relationship with the lender. Relationship discounts may result in the lender providing borrower with discounts when applying for the loan .
